title: TypeError: bad operand type for unary -: 'NoneType'
body:
i want to train `mozilla tts` on chinese corpus, when everything was setup, then it output an error below:

```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 498, in <module>
    main(args)
  File "train.py", line 436, in main
    scheduler, ap, epoch)
  File "train.py", line 79, in train
    for num_iter, data in enumerate(data_loader):
  File "/data/peter/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 637, in __next__
    return self._process_next_batch(batch)
  File "/data/peter/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 658, in _process_next_batch
    raise batch.exc_type(batch.exc_msg)
TypeError: Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/data/peter/anaconda3/envs/pytorch/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/utils/data/dataloader.py", line 138, in _worker_loop
    samples = collate_fn([dataset[i] for i in batch_indices])
  File "/data/peter/TTS/datasets/TTSDataset.py", line 183, in collate_fn
    mel = [self.ap.melspectrogram(w).astype('float32') for w in wav]
  File "/data/peter/TTS/datasets/TTSDataset.py", line 183, in <listcomp>
    mel = [self.ap.melspectrogram(w).astype('float32') for w in wav]
  File "/data/peter/TTS/utils/audio.py", line 152, in melspectrogram
    D = self._stft(self.apply_preemphasis(y))
  File "/data/peter/TTS/utils/audio.py", line 135, in apply_preemphasis
    return signal.lfilter([1, -self.preemphasis], [1], x)
TypeError: bad operand type for unary -: 'NoneType'
```

It seems that the main error comes from the `melspectrogram` part ?
